scenes.narrative_text: <think> Okay, the user wants me to generate an introduction for a fantasy story. They specified in French and want it to be interactive. Let me start by setting up the world. Maybe something magical but not too over-the-top. The tone needs to be immersive and engaging. I should introduce key elements like magic systems, maybe some creatures or quest elements. Need to keep it concise—maximum 200 words. End with a choice so the player has to make decisions later. Let me check if all rules are met:...
scenes.image_prompt: fantastical creature, magical effects, fantasy art, magical realism, ethereal atmosphere, enchanted forest, mystical creatures, magical effects, medieval architecture, glowing lights, fantasy landscape, highly detailed, professional artwork, cinematic lighting, masterpiece
suggested_actions: Essayer de comprendre comment vous êtes arrivé ici
